control.name: button1
control.description: Creates a new BarButtonItem with the specified settings (id, caption, etc.) and adds it to the bar manager's Items collection. The link that corresponds to the newly created item is displayed within the toolbar bar.

control.name: button2
control.description: Deletes the last item within the bar manager's Items collection.

control.name: button3
control.description: Deletes the last item link that is displayed within the toolbar.
